summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the I-90 Corridor; authorizing a second land transfer agreement to purchase from the State of Washington additional surplus real property of the State and the implementation of that agreement; authorizing the issuance to the State of promissory notes of the City for the deferred portion of the purchase price of each improved parcel, the resale of improved parcels, and the making of rehabilitation loans to qualified purchasers of such parcels.
